basic_info.description: Detail-oriented and passionate Software Developer with 5 years of experience in backend and full stack development. Proficient in designing, developing, and maintaining web and desktop applications using C#.NET and modern technologies. Strong background in API development, system integration, and problem-solving with a track record of performance and achievement.
